data.title: Touch the Water
data.meta_description: When an intern at a Senior Center challenges an elderly Native American woman to dream again, she evaluates her frail body and mind before setting out on a life changing journey.
data.text:

Seniors 60 +: $9.00

Children 1-11: $9.50

3D Movie Surcharge: $2.00

Prices do not include tax.

Children younger than 6 will NOT be admitted to R-rated features after 6pm

Military Special:

Buy one get one free at Red Rock 10 every WEDNESDAY with valid military id. Not good for multiple uses. One ID per ticket purchased. Does NOT include 3D films.

(One ID can get 1 free ticket with the purchase of 1 ticket only)
